website_summaries.verdict: If you have a toy breed, this ergonomic, durable, and accurate nail trimmer is the perfect tool for keeping their tiny toes trimmed.
cons: Not for dogs much larger than a Yorkie

customer_reviews.title: Nail crusher would be a better name.
customer_reviews.text: The only positive is the “limitator”, a piece of metal that helps gauge how much nail is trimmed and it works great, gives me confidence that I’ll not hurt my dog. Now, this thing doesn’t cut, it crushes. Badly. It’s not sharp, from day 1 it crushes all the nails and I actually have to go get real scissors to trim the leftovers of the crushed nail. I’ve tried sharpening it with the same tools used to sharpen regular nail trimmers, impossible, too narrow and curved blades make it impossible. I would not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty great. They're the first clippers I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty great. They're the first clippers I ever bought, and I was a little nervous about cutting my cat's nails for the first time. These clippers are quick and easy, the grip is really nice for holding them along with a squirming cat. The only reason I had to take off one star is on a few of the nails like they didn't cut perfectly all the way through, like a little scraggly piece would remain on those few nails and had to go over those a few times, all the others it was a perfect one-time cut.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya Yanko

customer_reviews.title: Good for green beans
customer_reviews.text: This is the best green bean edger I’ve ever had! It even has a stopper on it so that I don’t cut into the beans and it just allows me to trim off the stems! Cooking has never been easier. When I’m done in the kitchen they double as a nail clipper for dogs, I have always loved multipurpose tools! They are very sharp and easy to use, makes manicures a breeze for my fur children. 10/10 would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Love the safeguard!
customer_reviews.text: These Nail clippers work great! I love the nail guard to make sure you don’t trim your pets nails too short. My dog wasn’t very happy having his nails trimmed but I don’t believe it was because of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully these were cheap. We're very dull and not very effective cutting my dogs nails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great on even thick nails
customer_reviews.text: These are The best pet nail trimmers I have ever purchased! They cut through even very thick nails (like our bulldog had) easily, but still work on our pug mix who is under 20lbs. Really great product and 100% worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: T Simoneaux

customer_reviews.title: These clippers were not sharp and one had to squeeze pretty hard to make cut which seemed to cause discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Furminator clippers - returned item as they did not have nail guard and also did not perform well. These clippers were not sharp and one had to squeeze pretty hard to make cut which seemed to cause discomfort. Not a nice sharp, clean cut. Disappointed with the quality of this item
customer_reviews.author: Toodles

customer_reviews.title: ... Furminator dog brushes for over 10 years and we loved them. Now I'm trying the nail clippers and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Furminator dog brushes for over 10 years and we loved them. Now I'm trying the nail clippers and so far (if I could keep my ShiTzu still) they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M. King

customer_reviews.title: ... have arthritis & large non-slip grips made the clipper easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis & large non-slip grips made the clipper easy to handle.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We love it and so do the cats, great quality.

customer_reviews.title: Not very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s very difficult to use on a wiggly dog as it’s hard to see what you are cutting. Also it’s not very sharp so it doesn’t cut very well either.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not for larger dogs
customer_reviews.text: To my surprise I was very dissapointed with the clippers. They did not clip smoothly leaving the nail with sharp edges like it just tore the nail off rather than cutting it. They diffinately are not for use on a larger dog as the clippers dont open up enough for the nail to be inserted in the clipper. The small safety latch kept engaging when attempting to cut the nails and since it did not cut completely through the dog would sometime jerk their foot back causing some pain to the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Nail Clippers
customer_reviews.text: Decent nail clippers. Not quite a "light cut". Kind of have to press hard and the anti pinch thing gets in the way, you can't turn it to just have it out of your sight. The "safety" also relocks every time you cut a nail which is very annoying. I do like the grip on the handles and the cover for the clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: nothing special
customer_reviews.text: crushes the nail. Not any better than any other we have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stephen M. Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sharp enough to get through my dog's claws without cracking them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Miano

customer_reviews.title: Good clippers
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, these get the job done with no problem. Sometime it doesn't get the whole nail and leaves a little broken nail hanging on. They seem pretty sturdy and the guard works great.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: These work really well for my small dog. He HATES having his nails clipped, but somehow I can still manage with these clippers. Great buy, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Collette

customer_reviews.title: And I hate hurting my dogs
customer_reviews.text: These clippers split and crack the nail when trying to cut my two Basset Hound's nails. Very frustrating since they are brand spanking new. And I hate hurting my dogs, this makes them yelp in pain because they obviously aren't sharp enough to cut through thick nails like Basset Hounds have. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great features, don't like the design
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable gaurd protector is great! However, my dog hates this design because it;s a little to pinching for him. I switched to a guillotine style, less pressure and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if there's a difference between these clippers and other barands, but these get the job done. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Product works great and is easy to use even if you aren't ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you buy a muzzle for your pup if you intend to be doing their nail clipping at home. Even the most loving, well behaved puppy with snip at you if you start cutting their nails. Product works great and is easy to use even if you aren't a licensed groomer.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have four large dogs and this is holding up very well.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: They're easy enough to hold in my smaller hands. The hinging is good. And after several uses they are still sharp enough to clip my cat's claws quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Save time and money and don't buy

The nail clippers do not seem sharp and it is difficult to trim the nail. The item also appeared to have damage to the handle before uneven opened the package.

They're easy to squeeze and adjust depending upon nail size. The whole FURminator set has made grooming duties a breeze at home.

customer_reviews.text: Might as well cut my dogs nails with a butter knife. These cutters aren’t sharp at all! They basically crush the nail to cut it. Junk.

My dog is usually squirmy but has gotten used to the clippings - wouldn't buy another brand. Usually clippers are stiff and awkward, this one feels much more natural and doesn't seem to hurt the dogs because of how easy it is to measure the length.

I can't vouch for their longevity, have only used them 2-3 times so far, and sometimes the lock snaps down while I'm clipping (not a big deal, you just have to snap it back before clipping the next one), but other than that this is a great product.

product_meta.title: Furminator Nail Clipper for Dogs & Cats
product_meta.description:
Size:FURminator Nail Clippers with Non-slip Ergonomic HandleAs creators of the FURminator deShedding Tool, FURminator continues to raise the bar with innovative, proprietary shedding solutions. The FURminator lineup of deShedding tools, grooming tools, hair care products, bathing and hygiene solutions broadens and enhances the FURminator deShedding experience for pet parents and their pets. Simply put, there is no pet care solution on the market like the FURminator product line. The FURminator Dog & Cat Nail Clippers let you groom your pets nails right from your own home. Nails should be trimmed every 3-4 weeks, so why not use a comfortable and effective tool to get the results you need. The non-slip ergonomic handle gives you comfort and ease as you trim your pet's nails. Use the adjustable nail guide to get the cut you need. The sharp, stainless steel cutting edges ensure clean, even cuts. Get professional quality results from your own home with the FURminator product line.

AMAZON.COM


FURMINATOR NAIL GRINDER
A well groomed pet is a happy, healthy pet. But, there are many reasons that frequent visits to your pet stylist aren’t always possible. With FURminator’s line of professional quality grooming tools, you can achieve professional results in your own home. As industry innovators and experts on pet hair, FURminator understands the entire shedding cycle and the role that hair care and hygiene play in helping to reduce shedding and make you and your pet happy. For that reason, FURminator developed a high-performance line of hair-care, nail, hygiene, and waterless products.

Nail care is one of the most important and somewhat misunderstood areas of pet care for most pet owners. Because nails require clipping and grinding, many pet parents are afraid of injuring their pets, but ignoring nail care is just as harmful. FURminator's nail care solutions are completely safe and easy to use, thus eliminating the discomfort from the process, not only for pets but also for their owners.

BENEFITS OF USING THE FURMINATOR NAIL CLIPPERS:
 * Features an adjustable guide to make nail trimming efficient and painless
 * Sharp, stainless steel cutting edge ensures a clean, even cut without crushing the nail
 * Eliminates sore paws, legs and hips
 * Regular trimming (recommended every 3-4 weeks) promotes comfort and health
 * Non-slip, ergonomic handle for complete control
 * Anti-microbial plastic helps keep germs and bacteria to a minimum

INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE
 1. Monitor your pet’s nails and care for when appropriate to avoid overgrowth.
 2. Pet’s nails should not touch the floor when standing. Regular maintenance is important for the health and comfort of your pet.
 3. Before starting, note where the dead nail ends and where the live part – the quick- starts. Hold the paw firmly while gently pressing the base of each nail with your thumb.
 4. Use the nut on the outside of the nail guide to adjust desired cutting depth. Until you and your pet are comfortable, don’t get too aggressive. Cut just a little off every few days.

For a complete look at the FURminator product line, visit the FURminator Brand Store.

FURminator Nail Care Nail Clippers Accurately trim the nails of your dog with the FURminator Nail Clippers. Easy grip handle and safety guard allow you to use the stainless steel edge like a professional. Nail Grinder The FURminator Nail Grinder is an ergonomic nail grinder with powerful two speed motor, 120 grit grinding bands, and a safety light to ensure long lasting durability and easy use. Nail Grinder Replacement Bands Replace grinding bands as soon as they appear worn or when it becomes difficult to file your pet’s nails. 6 Pack, 120 Grit. DAILY SOLUTIONS



Brush - Detangles and smooths fur, distributes oils across skin and coat.

Cloths - Collects and reduces shedding from the surface of the pet.

Dog Shed Control Cloths Dog Finishing Comb Dog Rake Dog Dual Brush Dog Slicker Brush Dog Curry Comb WEEKLY SOLUTIONS



deShed - Reduces shedding up to 90%. Use tool weekly for 10-20 minute sessions.

FURminator deShedding Tool for Dogs FurVac Vacuum Accessory deShedding Waterless Spray MONTHLY SOLUTIONS



Bathe - Promotes healthy skin and coat, while reducing shedding.

Trim - Eliminates sore paws, legs, and hips and promotes overall health.

deShedding Ultra Premium Shampoo deShedding Ultra Premium Conditioner Nail Clippers Nail Grinder
feature_bullets: Adjustable guide makes nail trimming efficient and painless
Sharp, stainless steel cutting edge ensures a clean, even cut
Anti-microbial plastic keeps germs and bacteria to a minimum
